articles.description: Evans was in the running to take the title last year, but plans were reportedly thwarted after he caused a frenzy by accidentally sharing an explicit shot of his penis to social media.
articles.content:
Chris Evans is rumored to be the latest Hollywood hunk to land People's Sexiest Man Alive cover.
According to Page Six, the 40-year-old actor will be unveiled as this year's superior stud on next we… [+5205 chars]

articles.author: Kelby Vera
articles.title: Sons Of Anarchy's William Lucking remembered as 'elegant man with a brilliant intellect', dead at 80 - Daily Mail
articles.description: In a tribute Lucking's wife described her late husband, who was known for playing the rugged type, an 'elegant man with a brilliant intellect.'
articles.content:
Sons Of Anarchy player William Lucking has died at the age of 80.
The actor passed away at his home in Las Vegas, Nevada on October 18th, according to an obituary posted by his wife Sigrid Insull Lu… [+2685 chars]

articles.author: Jordyn Tilchen
articles.title: Kristen Stewart's Wedding May Be Officiated By Guy Fieri - Bustle
articles.description: Food Network chef Guy Fieri agreed to officiate Kristen Stewart's wedding to Dylan Meyer in a video clip that aired on 'Today.'
articles.content: Kristen Stewart already knows exactly where she wants to get married: Flavortown. During an appearance on SiriusXMs The Howard Stern Show earlier this week, the Spencer star announced her engagement … [+2622 chars]
